title: Innocence Awakened
description: Librarian note: This is an ACE of ASIN B00VVMASGWCoral shocks and horrifies her strict religious parents when she's caught reading a forbidden, 'filthy' novel and touching herself. Accused of impurity by her church pastor, she's sent away with old family friend Josiah Taite, a reclusive mountain homesteader with a reputation for strict discipline. Under his tutelage, she's told, she will learn to control herself and become the pure, submissive woman she's meant to be.But Coral soon learns that discipline at the hands of Josiah is nothing like what she's expected. Before she arrives at his home, she’s turned over his knee, bottom bared, and spanked! Soon, she finds herself drawn into a world unlike anything she’s ever dreamed, where pleasure and pain are one. The innocent has been awoken....
author: Jenycka Wolfe
